                    float[] qmm,
                    float[] vm,
                    float[] va,
                    BusType[] type)
             throws PAModelException
        Reports a mismatch
        Parameters:
        pmm - active power mismatch in MW for each bus
        qmm - reactive power mismatch in MVAr for each bus
        vm - Voltage magnitude (per-unit)
        va - Voltage angle (DEG)
        type -
        Throws:
        PAModelException
